attributes.action: Sack Ian Ayre Liverpool Managing Director
attributes.additional_details:
Petition to get Ian Ayre Liverpool Football Club Managing Director SACKED!!

Reasons for him to get sacked-

His CV is not good enough for a massive club like LFC
Can't negotiate with other football clubs for new players, which will cost LFC
No LFC fan actually like him
Talks nonsense
Out of his depth

Action to be taken-

Get Ian ayre sacked from LFC football club. Before the summer transfer window.
